IBA_J.ConvertListFiles.ADC

Class ADC

  • java.lang.Object
    • IBA_J.ConvertListFiles.ADC.ADC

  • public class ADC
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to describe ADC and associated methods ADC basically contains a list of events (an event : x,y,E)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ADC()
      ADC constructor with initialization of empt y eventList ans median energy for STIM map

      ADC constructor with path initialization

                          int y)

        y - y-coordinate for pixel
        Returns:

      • saveXYEListFile

        public void saveXYEListFile(java.io.DataOutputStream ops)
        Saves the ADC in a binary format (short)X,(short)Y,(Integer)E The file can be open with IBA_J (but not with the old Supavisio)
        Parameters:
        ops - stream where data will be saved. At the end of process ops will be closed.

      • saveXYEListFile

        public void saveXYEListFile(java.lang.String path)
        Saves the ADC in a binary format (short)X,(short)Y,(Integer)E The file can be open with IBA_J (but not with the old Supavisio)
        Parameters:
        path - filename for the datafile to be saved

      • saveXYEListFile

        public void saveXYEListFile(java.lang.String path,
                            java.lang.Short type)
        Saves the ADC in a file in the supavisio format (see below) The file can be open with the old Supavisio, not by IBA_J
        Parameters:
        path - filename for the datafile to be saved
        type - type of data to be saved (see below) supavisio is little endian type (short)0:pixe;1(rbs);2:Stim;5:erda (short)X size of map (short)Y size of map events: (short)X,(short)Y, (short)E

      • open

        public void open(java.io.DataInputStream ips)
        Open a sorted events list
        Parameters:
        ips - stream to be read

      • medianSort

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> medianSort()
        Sorts events according to X,Y and processes median energy map
        Returns:
        median, a list of integers corresponding to median energy in pixel

        Parameters:
